participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and outgoing, enjoys expressing herself through music and literature.
participant_1.background: I have been in band all four years of high school. I am interested in producing music. I am a senior in high school. I have 2 brothers. I am going to start school at the University of Kentucky.

participant_2.name: Chris
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, enjoys engaging with stories and ideas through reading.
participant_2.background: I am a deaf man. I never learned how to drive. I love to read books. I sometimes scratch my nose for fun. My favorite number is 7.

content.text: Hi! What's your name?
My name is Chris.
Nice to meet you, Chris! My name is (user 1's name).
Nice to meet you too, (user 1's name).
What do you do for fun?
I like to read books, watch movies, and play video games.
That sounds like fun. I like to read books and play video games too.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I especially like fantasy, science fiction, and mystery novels.
I like to read those too! I'm currently reading a fantasy novel by Brandon Sanderson.
I've heard good things about Brandon Sanderson. I might have to check that out.
You should! It's really good.
What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of video games, but I especially like RPGs and action games.
I like those too! I'm currently playing a new RPG called "Elden Ring."
I've heard about that game! It looks really good.
It is! It's a lot of fun.
I might have to check it out.
You should! It's really good.
It sounds like we have a lot in common.
It does! We should hang out sometime and play some video games.
That sounds like fun! I'm free this weekend.
Me too! Let's do it.
